meta.disclaimer: Do not rely on openFDA to make decisions regarding medical care. While we make every effort to ensure that data is accurate, you should assume all results are unvalidated. We may limit or otherwise restrict your access to the API in line with our Terms of Service.

results.reason_for_recall: Firm received a complaint of a bird foot found in the baked product.
results.code_info: No expiration date is printed on product, however, at the store level, retailer will apply an expiration sticker onto each cake square.  Lot coding is a 5 digit number, SYDDD, where  S  designates the shift (1,2, or 3),  Y  designates the year, and  DDD  designates the Julian day.  Example  19038 where  1  = shift,  9  = year,  038  = Julian day      Lot codes: 19038 29038 39037
results.distribution_pattern: AR, AZ, CA, FL, GA, HI, ID, IL, IN, KY, MD, MI, NC, NY, OK. OR, PA, SC, TN, TX.
results.product_description: Ne-Mo's Chocolate Cake Square with Cream Cheese Icing, item 104;  Net Wt. 3 oz.  Case UPC: 2007606401046 4;  Display pk 6 ea/pk UPC: 10076064010460 7  Individual unit UPC: 07606400104 8    Frozen  product has a shelf life of 365 days from the date of production  Refrigerated product has a shelf life of 30 days from the date it is removed from the freezer  Ambient product has a shelf life of 7 days from the date it is removed from the freezer    Horizon Food Group, San Diego, CA 92127
